title: Loco1887
author: Loco1887
content: Is it a good buy in your opinion around 40cent?

comments.author: crunck
comments.body: Quote from: Loco1887 on November 13, 2022, 01:45:59 AMIs it a good buy in your opinion around 40cent?Is Moonbearn a project built on the Cosmos ecosystem? In my opinion, now is the time to limit investing in altcoins, we are going through bear season and anything bad could happen again. jJust focus on bitcoin and stay away from low cap altcoins, they are really too risky. The lesson of luna is still there and most recently FTT. Be careful with altcoins.
